body_html:
TensorFlow preallocates all the memory in self-managed pools. nvidia-smi does not show the pool use percentage, because only TensorFlow know that. You could try tensorboard, not sure if it shows the memory status.

See this:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/34199233/how-to-prevent-tensorflow-from-allocating-the-totality-of-a-gpu-memory
